title: I'd Like To Be
subtle:
Poetry (nonfiction), 176 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 600            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     E		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and K
description: Life has endless possibilities, and you can be anything you want to be! I'd Like to Be is an entertaining poem that introduces students to a variety of professions. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of contractions. The book and lesson are also available for levels E and K.
meta: auto, discover, fantasy, greasy, stew, vet
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Initial and Final Blends : Discriminate initial and final consonant st-blend
Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blend
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order
